manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="77" android:versionName="4.0-debug" package="com.achep.acdisplay" platformBuildVersionCode="23" platformBuildVersionName="6.0-2704002">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="16" android:targetSdkVersion="23" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WAKE_LOCK" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.PREVENT_POWER_KEY" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_TASKS" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS" />
	<permission android:name="android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.android.vending.BILLING" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<application android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c00d6" android:label="AcDisplay" android:icon="res/mipmap-mdpi-v4/ic_launcher.png" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.App" android:debuggable="true" android:allowBackup="true" android:largeHeap="true" android:supportsRtl="true" android:isGame="false">
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c00d7" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.AcDisplayActivity" android:exported="false" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:launchMode="singleInstance" android:screenOrientation="nosensor" android:configChanges="0x4a0" />
		<activity android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.MainActivity" android:launchMode="singleTask">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c00da" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.IntroActivity" android:launchMode="singleTask" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c00d9" android:label="Settings" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
		<activity android:name="com.achep.base.ui.activities.SubSettings" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:configChanges="0x4a0" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c00dc" android:label="Widgets" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.WidgetPickerActivity" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" />
		<activity android:label="Proximity sensor" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.SettingsProximitySensorActivity" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Holo" android:label="Blacklist" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.BlacklistActivity" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Holo" android:label="App settings" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.SubBlacklistActivity" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:configChanges="0x4a0" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.BlacklistActivity" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c0040" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.tests.ShakeTestActivity" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c0040" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.tests.IdleExitTestActivity" android:taskAffinity=".settings" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:parentActivityName="com.achep.acdisplay.ui.activities.settings.Settings2" />
		<service android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.services.MediaService" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.service.notification.NotificationListenerService" />
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.BIND_MEDIA_CONTROL_SERVICE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</service>
		<service android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.services.AccessibilityService" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityService" />
			</intent-filter>
			<meta-data android:name="android.accessibilityservice" android:resource="res/xml/extras_accessibility_config.xml" />
		</service>
		<service android:label="AcDisplay services" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.services.BathService" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.receiver.LocalReceiverActivity" android:exported="false" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:launchMode="singleInstance">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:scheme="acdisplay" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<receiver android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.receiver.ReceiverSystem">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_POWER_CONNECTED" />
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_POWER_DISCONNECTED" />
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.BOOT_COMPLETED" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:label="AcDisplay" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.receiver.AdminReceiver" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN" android:description="Needed to manage the screen timeout policy.">
			<meta-data android:name="android.app.device_admin" android:resource="res/xml/extras_device_admin.xml" />
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.app.action.DEVICE_ADMIN_ENABLED" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.providers.ToggleWidgetProvider">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_ENABLED" />
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_DISABLED" />
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_UPDATE" />
				<action android:name="android.appwidget.action.APPWIDGET_DELETED" />
			</intent-filter>
			<meta-data android:name="android.appwidget.provider" android:resource="res/xml/extras_appwidget_toggle_config.xml" />
		</receiver>
		<provider android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.providers.LogAttachmentProvider" android:exported="true" android:authorities="com.achep.acdisplay.logs" />
		<receiver android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.receiver.ReceiverPublic" android:exported="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ENABLE" />
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.DISABLE" />
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.TOGGLE" />
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ACTIVE_MODE_ENABLE" />
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ACTIVE_MODE_DISABLE" />
				<action android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.ACTIVE_MODE_TOGGLE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<receiver android:label="AcDisplay" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/ic_toggle_acdisplay.png" android:name="com.achep.acdisplay.plugins.powertoggles.ToggleReceiver" android:permission="com.painless.pc.permission.CONTROL_PLUGIN" android:exported="true">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.painless.pc.ACTION_SET_STATE" />
			</intent-filter>
		</receiver>
		<meta-data android:name="xposedmodule" android:value="true" />
		<meta-data android:name="xposedminversion" android:value="2.0*" />
		<meta-data android:name="xposeddescription" android:value="Helps AcDisplay to integrate deeper into Android." />
		<service android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.internal.HeapAnalyzerService" android:enabled="false" android:process=":leakcanary" />
		<service android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.DisplayLeakService" android:enabled="false" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c002e" android:label="Leaks" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/leak_canary_icon.png" android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.internal.DisplayLeakActivity" android:enabled="false" android:taskAffinity="com.squareup.leakcanary">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0c0183" android:label="Storage permission" android:icon="res/drawable-mdpi-v4/leak_canary_icon.png" android:name="com.squareup.leakcanary.internal.RequestStoragePermissionActivity" android:enabled="false" android:taskAffinity="com.squareup.leakcanary" />
	</application>
</manifest>
